name: Alien Doll Destruction 2 (ADD2)
description:
The sequel to Alien Doll Destruction! More things to DESTROY that alien and wipe them off of Galgur! Water and  Lava that act actually like liquid! (Kind of) There are even more things coming in updates, too! 

Update 0.2

I have added mobile support and four new objects! Also, the underground section has a rocky background!

Update 0.25

I fixed player movement on mobile and made a reset button for mobile users.
